author: sauliusgrigaitis
content: Did anyone investigate why Kiln beacon explorer shows this - after the slot https://beaconchain.kiln.themerge.dev/block/29149 there are a lot of empty slots. The next non-empty slot according to the explorer is https://beaconchain.kiln.themerge.dev/block/29309 , however it points to the parent https://beaconchain.kiln.themerge.dev/block/b8596845ad036528e7a81da0c3fdd7c9b23beb9f89839ffbd203c508a6c6c4ef that explorer doesn't know. Same with the next non-empty slots https://beaconchain.kiln.themerge.dev/block/29325.

author: parithosh
content: We had a bunch of explorer issues around that time, it is possible that we switched something.. Could you query your node if hte respective block exists?

author: tbenr
content:
following to the recent call, here are a couple of things that might be helpful in troubleshooting with Teku:
some interesting subcommands:
- `./teku debug-tools -h`
Utilities for debugging issues

Options:
  -h, --help      Show this help message and exit.
  -V, --version   Print version information and exit.
Commands:
  db                        Debugging tools for inspecting the contents of the
                              database
  pretty-print, pp          Print SSZ objects as formatted JSON
  generate-autocomplete     Generate a bash/zsh autocomplete file
  generate-swagger-docs     Generate swagger-docs for rest APIs.
  get-validator-assignment  Gets the committee assignment for a validator at a
                              specific epoch.

- `./teku debug-tools db -h`

get-deposits                List the ETH1 deposit information stored in the
                                database
get-finalized-state         Get the finalized state, if available, as SSZ
get-latest-finalized-state  Get the latest finalized state, if available, as
                                SSZ

- `./teku transition -h`
Manually run state transitions

Options:
  -h, --help      Show this help message and exit.
  -V, --version   Print version information and exit.
Commands:
  blocks  Process blocks on the pre-state to get a post-state
  slots   Process empty slots on the pre-state to get a post-state

author: tbenr
content:
- rest api (run teku with `--rest-api-docs-enabled --rest-api-docs-enabled` and go to: http://127.0.0.1:5051/swagger-ui )
increase debug level at runtime:
`PUT /teku/v1/admin/log_level`

dump current proto array:
`GET /teku/v1/debug/beacon/protoarray`


 run archive node and storing non canonical blocks:
https://docs.teku.consensys.net/en/latest/Reference/CLI/CLI-Syntax/#data-storage-archive-frequency
https://docs.teku.consensys.net/en/latest/Reference/CLI/CLI-Syntax/#data-storage-mode
https://docs.teku.consensys.net/en/latest/Reference/CLI/CLI-Syntax/#data-storage-non-canonical-blocks-enabled

teku metrics dashboard:
https://grafana.com/grafana/dashboards/13457
